title: WEDDING INVITATION FONT
content:
This is wedding invite, i’m currently settingup. They want this font.  
Does anyone know what it is???  
Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [invite.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=invite.jpg) | 47.12 KB |
author: wandar

comments.content:
Viva hits the spot, me thinks…

OTF by Adobe, Light. Also availabe as PS1.

Andreas Seidel’s [Missale Incana](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111041839/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/astype/missale-incana/) is very similar, but that just has Caps & Small Caps, no lower case.

\_\_  
 [www.typeoff.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111041839/http:/www.typeoff.de/)

Wanda, here is a link to [Viva](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111041839/http:/www.linotype.com/48052/viva-family.html)  
\_\_  
 [www.typeoff.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111041839/http:/www.typeoff.de/)
_OH, AND, WILL YOU EVER STOP WRITING YOUR THREAD TITLES IN ALL CAPS, WANDA.? :)_

What would i do without all of you.

(emotional)
